mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Contract (COMPANY_ID, CONTRACT_START_DATE, CONTRACT_END_DATE) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{contractStartDate}, #{contractEndDate})
mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID , CONTRACT.CONTRACT_START_DATE , CONTRACT.CONTRACT_END_DATE FROM CONTRACT INNER JOIN COMPANY ON COMPANY.COMPANY_ID = CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID WHERE CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND CONTRACT.CONTRACT_END_DATE BETWEEN NOW() AND TIMESTAMPADD(YEAR, 1, NOW())
SELECT CONTRACT_ID , COMPANY_ID , CONTRACT_START_DATE , CONTRACT_END_DATE FROM CONTRACT

SELECT CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID , CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID , CONTRACT.CONTRACT_START_DATE , CONTRACT.CONTRACT_END_DATE , COMPANY.COMPANY_NAME FROM CONTRACT INNER JOIN COMPANY ON COMPANY.COMPANY_ID = CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID WHERE CONTRACT.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY CONTRACT.CONTRACT_START_DATE DESC LIMIT 1;
